Hello all: i am using 9.04 gnome, i am trying to copy a 4.2 GB iso image to my pen drive of size 8.0 GB, but after copying 4.0  GB, its giving error file too large, how can i do this plz can any one tell me??
Your pendrive is probably using the FAT32 filesystem.
Which has a file size limit of 4 GB.
